critical_fix.issue: V10 dynamic strike filtering caused strikes to disappear during backtests
critical_fix.example: M2 trade: 25050 PE existed at entry (spot=25,060) but missing at exit (spot=24,481)
critical_fix.impact: Backtest used interpolated/incorrect price (₹797.88 vs realistic ~₹600)
critical_fix.solution: V11 persistent strike generation based on global price range

strike_strategy.approach: Global persistent strikes (vs V10 per-timestamp filtering)
